chunk.textFormat: Why do you have to tighten the cylinder head in a certain sequence? (one is correct)

1. From centre and out in order not to jam the gasket.
2. From out to centre in order not to jam the gasket.
3. From left to right in order not to jam the gasket.

Discuss the answers with the participants if there have been any misunderstandings or linguistic problems. Questions that could help to improve the format of the questionnaire in the future may arise.
Let each participant work with the question for about 2-3 min.
After that the trainer shall go through the correct answer.

1. From centre and out in order not to jam the gasket. *
2. From out to centre in order not to jam the gasket.
3. From left to right in order not to jam the gasket.
